duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide industry-leading client service both in person and on the phone, developing and expanding new and existing client relationships.
Offer and sell financial solutions to meet client needs based on consultative conversations, and refer clients to other business partners for additional growth opportunities.
Support teller transactions as required, contributing to meeting or exceeding client service and sales targets.
Conduct consultative conversations, act upon or refer more complex client needs or financial goals to other internal specialists, and participate in Truist Retail Community Bank Leadership Routines.
Advance individual knowledge of sales techniques and product knowledge to better serve clients, and advise on consumer lending options and take loan applications.

Adhere to internal controls, operational procedures, and risk management policies, ensuring a consistent client service experience by engaging clients with smiling, courteous conversation while conducting transactions.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent education
